title: Angels and Fallen Angels
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Yoshiko-san, Yoshiko-san! Apparently today is the “Whispers of an Angel” day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane! Sigh….It served no connection to me who has fallen….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That’s not true! At times like this, you should take advantage of being a fallen angel…!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fallen angels are formerly angels right? If so, then they may be able to hear the whispers of the angels. If they can hear the angels, then they may be able to disrupt them!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>No, I don’t particularly want to disrupt angels or anything like that, though….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>What sweet words are you saying!? They are the ones who colluded against you, they made the sinless Yohane fall to the ground, right! It’s a chance to turn the tables!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Setsuna, you…. Have been reading something, haven’t you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes! The one I’m reading just now is about how an angel was tricked and made to fall to the ground, turning into a fallen angel….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Geez! Yohane isn’t like that okay!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
